mapper.select: select u.username,u.name,u.id from base_user u left join base_group_member gm on gm.user_id = u.id where u.is_deleted='0' AND gm.group_id = #{groupId}
select u.username,u.name,u.id from base_user u left join base_group_leader gm on gm.user_id = u.id where u.is_deleted='0' AND gm.group_id = #{groupId}
select bd.id from base_depart bd inner join base_position_depart bpd on bpd.depart_id = bd.id inner join base_position_user bpu on bpd.position_id = bpu.position_id where bpu.user_id = #{userId}
select u.depart_id from base_user u where u.is_deleted='0' AND u.id = #{userid}
select u.tenant_id from base_user u where u.is_deleted='0' AND u.id = #{userid}
SELECT gl.group_id FROM base_group_leader gl WHERE gl.user_id = #{userid}
SELECT gm.group_id FROM base_group_member gm WHERE gm.user_id = #{userid}

SELECT bu.`name` userName,bu.`id` userId,bu.`sex`,bu.`mobile_phone` mobilePhone, bd.`name` deptName,bd.`id` deptId, bp.`name` positionName,bp.`id` positionId, bg.`name` groupName,bg.`id` groupId FROM base_user bu LEFT JOIN base_depart_user dbu ON dbu.`user_id`=bu.`id` LEFT JOIN base_depart bd ON bd.`id`=dbu.`depart_id` LEFT JOIN base_position_user bpu ON bpu.`user_id`=bu.`id` LEFT JOIN base_position bp ON bp.`id`=bpu.`position_id` LEFT JOIN base_group_leader bgl ON bgl.`user_id`=bd.`id` LEFT JOIN base_group bg ON bg.`id`=bgl.`group_id` WHERE bu.is_deleted='0' AND bu.`id` in (${userId})

SELECT bu.`id`,bu.`name` userName,bu.`mobile_phone`,bd.`name` departName,bp.`name` positionName FROM base_group bg JOIN base_group_leader bgl ON bgl.`group_id`=bg.`id` JOIN base_user bu ON bu.`id`=bgl.`user_id` LEFT JOIN base_depart_user bdu ON bdu.`user_id`=bu.`id` LEFT JOIN base_depart bd ON bd.`id`=bdu.`depart_id` LEFT JOIN base_position_user bpu ON bpu.`user_id`=bu.`id` LEFT JOIN base_position bp ON bp.`id`=bpu.`position_id` WHERE bu.is_deleted='0' AND bg.`code`=#{groupCode}

SELECT bu.id userId, bu.`name` userName, bu.mobile_phone mobilePhone,
bd.id deptId, bu.attr1 image,
bu.crt_user_id crt_user_id, bu.tenant_id tenant_id FROM base_user bu LEFT JOIN base_depart_user bdu ON bdu.user_id = bu.id LEFT JOIN base_depart bd ON bd.id = bdu.depart_id WHERE bu.is_deleted = '0' AND bu.is_disabled = '0' AND bu.is_super_admin = '0'
AND bu.name LIKE #{name}
AND bd.id IN
#{id}
GROUP BY bu.id, bu.`name`, bu.mobile_phone, bd.`id`, bu.attr1, bu.crt_user_id, bu.tenant_id ORDER BY bu.crt_time DESC, bu.upd_time DESC
